item.title: Android + IOIO + Window Blinds Control
item.description: Demo Android application to control window blinds using IOIO and full rotation servos. For additional background information on interfacing Android with IOIO, check out my other introductory tutorials: Android + IOIO + Simple Digital Output Android + IOIO + Simple Digital Input Android + IOIO + Simple Analog Output Android + IOIO + Simple Analog Input Background on Android development, IOIO, and electronics: Meet IOIO IOIO for Android Beginners Guide IOIO Wiki Android Developer’s Guide
